content: --दिन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} cloudy, rainy. (--नं {1} a bad day in general. {2} a rainy or cloudy day, stormy or rainy weather; उन्नमत्यकालदुर्दिनं <ls>Mk. 5</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 43</ls>; <ls>Mv. 4. 57.</ls> {3} a shower (of any. thing); <ls>R. 4. 41</ls>, <ls n="R. 4.">82</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 47</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 5.</ls> {4} thick darkness. (दुर्दिनायते <ab>Den.</ab> <ab>A.</ab>to become cloudy.)
